channel.title: organisational behaviour on Flirting With Neutrality

item.title: "New on New"
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description:
What is it?

When combining more than one new resource with another one. Resources could be almost anything, i.e. people, technology, processes etc.
